data.Petr Janů:
Petr Janů is a 25-year-old lab assistant who enjoys binge-watching boxed sets, golf and watching sport. He is kind and reliable, but can also be very lazy and a bit impatient.

He is Czech. He finished school and then left academia. He is allergic to pine cones. He has a severe phobia of crowds.

Physically, Petr is slightly overweight but otherwise in good shape. He is very tall with walnut skin, brown hair and black eyes.

He grew up in a middle class neighbourhood. He was raised in a happy family home with two loving parents.

He is currently married to Alena Kopková. Alena is the same age as him and works as a librarian.

Petr's best friend is a lab assistant called Monika Němec. They have a very firey friendship. He also hangs around with Zuzana Kupská and Philip Mikulík. They enjoy theatre together.

personality.Hobbies: binge-watching boxed sets, golf, watching sport, theatre, swimming, helping old ladies across the road, playing video games, reading, extreme ironing, attending museums

background.Early years: Petr grew up in a middle class neighbourhood. He was raised in a happy family home with two loving parents
background.Formative years: Petr got his first job as a lab assistant at age 18. Petr decided not to go to college

monika_němec.Relationship: They have a very firey friendship

zuzana_kupská.Relationship: They have a very firey friendship

philip_mikulík.Relationship: They have a very firey friendship

radka_rambousková.Reason for breakup: Radka felt Petr was too much of a doormat

marta_menclová.Reason for breakup: Marta felt smothered by Petr's generosity

timeline.2012: Relationship with Radka Rambousková ends (Radka felt Petr was too much of a doormat) Starts work at Ring Research Lab as a lab assistant
timeline.2016: Relationship with Marta Menclová ends (Marta felt smothered by Petr's generosity)
